location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lord Minto [Gilbert Elliot Murray Kynynmound], Governor General in Council, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that William Bruce has drawn up a set of bills in favour of Colvin Bazett & Co. to meet the disbursements of the Bushire Residency.
